levels.levelDescription: Welcome to Shadowsong Thicket, where dark grass whispers eerie melodies and hidden dangers lurk beneath the murky waters. Traverse carefully to avoid falling victim to the treacherous depths.

Journey through the chilling landscape of Ethereal Desolation, where the cold, unforgiving snow blankets the ground. Beware the gaping deep-dark holes that threaten to swallow all who dare to venture too close.

Step into the Veil of Shadows, a realm cloaked in tundra sand and colored by molten lava rivers that sear the land. In the heart of this fiery domain awaits the legendary Ethereal Specter of the Void, a trickster of unmatched power and cunning.
